version_description: Fixed issue with remote update of firmware
Fixed bug when no network connection is present.

2.2.2
iPhone 6 screen size compatibility
Numerous bug fixes
Remote Bean firmware fetching
Bug Fixes
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements
Minor bug fixes
Announcements page no longer opens Safari app on iOS 9.
Minor bug fixes and updates

- Sign up for Punch Through's new BLE newsletter! Stay on top of the latest and greatest in Bluetooth Low Energy.
- Fixed a lingering bug that prevented writing to virtual peripheral characteristics. Thank you to those who alerted us to the problem.
- Tap the Punch Through logo at the bottom of the screen to check out our lovely website.

- Fixed crash when connecting to "Unnamed" device.
- Updated app icon.
* Fixed bug that prevented app from opening if experiencing network connectivity problems. Apologies to our users in China who were most heavily affected due to the "Great Firewall".

* Added new feature that allows the user to sort and filter discovered devices by signal strength.
* Fixed alignment of alert that occurs when Bluetooth is turned off.
New and improved look!

- If you have an iPad, you'll be delighted to know that we now support Split View and other multitasking features! Perfect for a yet-unannounced feature, shh…
- Polished up the app and squashed some pesky bugs specific to the new iOS 11
- Other bug fixes and improvements

Punch Through is excited to announce Cloud Connect, a new feature in LightBlue® Explorer for connected BLE devices that support indications or notifications! If you have ever connected to a BLE IoT device like a smart thermometer and wanted to visualize the data change over time, Cloud Connect allows you to send all the indication or notification data that you get from a BLE device in real time to a cloud platform provider as a stream of values.

We chose to start with AWS Internet of Things (IoT) and Adafruit IO because we wanted to offer world-class enterprise compatibility while also offering a great way to get up and running really fast with cool visualizations. Stay tuned because we're looking to add more platform options in the future!

Punch Through is excited to announce Cloud Connect, a new feature in LightBlue® Explorer for connected BLE devices that support indications or notifications! If you have ever connected to a BLE IoT device like a smart thermometer and wanted to visualize the data change over time, Cloud Connect allows you to send all the indication or notification data that you get from a BLE device in real time to a cloud platform provider as a stream of values. Visit our blog at https://punchthrough.com/blog for more information!

We chose to start with AWS Internet of Things (IoT) and Adafruit IO because we wanted to offer world-class enterprise compatibility while also offering a great way to get up and running really fast with cool visualizations. Stay tuned because we're looking to add more platform options in the future!

- Fixed some UI issues you may or may not have noticed on iOS 11
- Fixed a major crasher that slipped through the cracks, sorry about that!
- In case you missed it, we announced Cloud Connect, a new feature in LightBlue® Explorer for connected BLE devices that support indications or notifications! Visit our blog at https://punchthrough.com/blog for more information!

- Bug fixes
- In case you missed it, we announced Cloud Connect, a new feature in LightBlue® Explorer for connected BLE devices that support indications or notifications! Visit our blog at https://punchthrough.com/blog for more information!

- Got a shiny new iPhone X? We've updated our app to also look great on your new iPhone!
- In case you missed it, we announced Cloud Connect, a new feature in LightBlue® Explorer for connected BLE devices that support indications or notifications! Visit our blog at https://punchthrough.com/blog for more information!
Bug fixes and compatibility updates for iOS 12.

- By popular demand, you can now interact with Bluetooth devices that are currently connected to your iOS device in scan results.
- Some bug fixes and optimizations to keep the engine running smoothly.
Check out Punch Through's blog in the Info->Announcements section of the app! We cover a range of topics, from IoT news to in-depth BLE breakdowns.
We've redesigned some parts of the app to make navigation more intuitive.
Updated app onboarding and removed user survey.
Fixed a crash on iPads when attempting to share the app's log contents, and other minor improvements under the hood.
Fixed a crash that may happen when navigating to the "More" tab. Thanks for using LightBlue®!

- Added support for iOS 13's Dark Mode
- Additional bug fixes
- Extended device support

- LightBlue® Explorer now has extended support for the Microchip AVR-BLE and PIC-BLE development boards! These boards are integrated with a custom view for a streamlined hardware/software development ecosystem.
- Fixed issue on Log tab that caused some data to be truncated.

- LightBlue® now has extended support for the Microchip AVR-BLE and PIC-BLE development boards! These boards are integrated with a custom view for a streamlined hardware/software development ecosystem.
- Bug fixes.

- Fixed some bugs that caused crashes for a small number of users
- Fixed keyboard dismiss issue on Microchip view when serial data is recieved
- New loading indicator

- LightBlue® is now available on macOS!
- You can now search for peripherals by name from the main scan screen.
- You can now cancel an in-progress connection attempt.
- General bug fixes.

Improvements:
* You can now copy device, service, and characteristic names and their UUIDs! Tap and hold one of these values to copy it to the pasteboard. (iOS only at this time)
* Improved scanning performance
Fix crash on iOS 12 and earlier.
Check out our new Settings menu (under the "More" tab) to toggle usage data collection, view our onboarding interface, contact us quickly, or read our privacy policy and acknowledgements.
Check out our new Settings menu (under the "More" tab) to toggle usage data collection, view our onboarding interface, contact us quickly, or read our privacy policy and acknowledgements.
- Minor bug fixes
- New Learn tab now provides useful BLE articles from our blog.

- New Learn tab now provides useful BLE articles from our blog.
- Minor bug fixes
